modules.name: TDD Methodology
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive guide to Test-Driven Development (TDD) using the Red-Green-Refactor cycle. Covers writing failing tests first, implementing minimal code to pass, and refactoring for quality.
whatItDoes: Defines TDD cycle: Red → Green → Refactor
Provides test naming conventions and patterns
Includes edge case and boundary testing
Guides on test isolation and mocking
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any project following TDD practices. Use when writing new features or fixing bugs.

modules.name: Web App Testing
modules.description: Web application testing strategies with Playwright/Vitest
modules.longDescription: End-to-end testing strategies for web applications using Playwright and Testing Library. Covers component testing, integration testing, and full E2E flows.
whatItDoes: Covers component testing with Testing Library
modules.whenToUse: When building web applications that need E2E testing. Works with React, Vue, Astro, and other frameworks.

modules.name: API Testing
modules.description: API testing strategies with Vitest and Supertest
modules.longDescription: Testing strategies for REST APIs including unit tests, integration tests, and contract testing. Covers request validation, response assertions, and error handling.
modules.whenToUse: When building backend APIs with Hono, Express, Fastify, or other Node.js frameworks.

modules.name: Performance Testing
modules.longDescription: Performance testing methodologies including load testing, stress testing, and benchmarking. Covers identifying bottlenecks, measuring response times, and optimizing performance.
modules.whenToUse: When you need to ensure your application can handle expected load and meets performance requirements.

modules.name: Security Testing
modules.longDescription: Security testing practices covering OWASP Top 10, penetration testing basics, and vulnerability scanning. Focuses on identifying and preventing common security issues.
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any application handling user data or sensitive information. Use before production deployment.

modules.name: QA Criteria Validator
modules.longDescription: Validation checklist for ensuring features meet quality standards before release. Covers functionality, edge cases, performance, and user experience.
modules.whenToUse: Before marking any feature as complete. Essential for maintaining quality standards.

modules.name: Security Audit
modules.description: Comprehensive security audit procedures and checklists
modules.longDescription: Complete security audit framework covering code review, dependency scanning, configuration review, and compliance verification. Provides actionable remediation steps.
modules.whenToUse: Before major releases, after security incidents, or as part of regular security reviews.

modules.name: Performance Audit
modules.longDescription: Performance audit framework for web applications covering Lighthouse metrics, bundle analysis, rendering performance, and backend optimization opportunities.
whatItDoes: Audits Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
Analyzes bundle size and code splitting
Identifies N+1 queries and DB issues
modules.whenToUse: When application feels slow, before major launches, or during performance optimization sprints.

modules.name: Accessibility Audit
modules.description: Accessibility audit and WCAG compliance checking
modules.longDescription: Accessibility audit procedures following WCAG 2.1 guidelines. Covers keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, color contrast, and semantic HTML.
whatItDoes: Reviews ARIA usage and semantic HTML
modules.whenToUse: Essential for public-facing applications. Use during development and before releases.

modules.name: Error Handling Patterns
modules.description: Error handling best practices and patterns
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive error handling patterns for TypeScript applications. Covers Result types, custom error classes, error boundaries, and graceful degradation.
modules.whenToUse: When setting up error handling architecture or improving existing error handling.

modules.name: NextAuth.js Patterns
modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for NextAuth.js authentication in Next.js applications. Covers OAuth providers, credentials provider, JWT/session strategies, middleware protection, and role-based access control.
modules.whenToUse: When building Next.js applications that need authentication. Supports OAuth providers (GitHub, Google, etc.) and custom credentials.

modules.name: i18n Patterns
modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for internationalization in React and Next.js applications. Covers next-intl and react-i18next setup, translation file management, pluralization, formatting, and RTL support.
whatItDoes: Sets up next-intl for Next.js apps
modules.whenToUse: When building applications that need to support multiple languages or locales.

modules.name: Zustand Patterns
modules.description: Zustand state management patterns and best practices
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive patterns for Zustand state management in React applications. Covers store creation, slices, middleware (persist, immer, devtools), selectors, and TypeScript integration.
whatItDoes: Implements slice pattern for modular stores
Uses immer middleware for immutable updates
Integrates with React Query for server state
modules.whenToUse: When building React applications needing simple, lightweight client state management. Perfect for small to medium apps.

modules.name: Redux Toolkit Patterns
modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for Redux Toolkit (RTK) including store setup, slices, async thunks, RTK Query for data fetching, and TypeScript integration with typed hooks.
whatItDoes: Configures Redux store with typed hooks
Creates slices with reducers and actions
Implements async thunks with error handling
Sets up RTK Query for API integration
modules.whenToUse: When building large-scale React applications with complex state interactions, or when team prefers Redux patterns.

modules.name: TanStack Query Patterns
modules.description: TanStack Query (React Query) server state management
modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for TanStack Query server state management including queries, mutations, infinite queries, optimistic updates, prefetching, and cache management.
whatItDoes: Creates typed queries with error handling
Implements optimistic updates for better UX
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any React application fetching data from APIs. Handles caching, background updates, and server state.

modules.name: React Hook Form Patterns
modules.description: React Hook Form with Zod validation patterns
modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for React Hook Form with Zod validation including basic forms, nested objects, arrays with useFieldArray, controlled components, file uploads, and multi-step forms.
whatItDoes: Creates forms with Zod schema validation
modules.whenToUse: When building forms in React applications. Provides performant form handling with minimal re-renders and great TypeScript support.

modules.name: Git Commit Helper
modules.description: Git commit message formatting and conventions
modules.longDescription: Conventional commit message formatting following Angular conventions. Covers commit types, scopes, breaking changes, and atomic commit practices.
whatItDoes: Defines commit types (feat, fix, refactor, etc.)
modules.whenToUse: Use for every commit to maintain consistent git history.

modules.name: Markdown Formatter
modules.longDescription: Standards for consistent markdown formatting including headings, lists, code blocks, tables, and links. Ensures readable and maintainable documentation.
whatItDoes: Standardizes list and code block formatting
Checks language specifications in code blocks
modules.whenToUse: When writing or reviewing documentation to ensure consistency.

modules.name: Add Memory
modules.description: Learning and memory management for AI agents
modules.longDescription: Skill for capturing learnings and adding them to CLAUDE.md. Helps maintain project-specific knowledge and best practices discovered during development.
whatItDoes: Archives old learnings when limit reached
modules.whenToUse: When discovering new patterns, fixing recurring issues, or learning project-specific practices.

modules.name: PDF Creator/Editor
modules.longDescription: Guidelines for creating and editing PDF documents programmatically. Covers report generation, invoice creation, and document manipulation.
modules.whenToUse: When your application needs to generate or manipulate PDF documents.

modules.name: JSON Data Auditor
modules.longDescription: Tools and techniques for validating JSON data structures, auditing data quality, and ensuring schema compliance with Zod.
modules.whenToUse: When importing data, validating API responses, or auditing database records.

modules.name: Brand Guidelines
modules.description: Brand and design system guidelines template
modules.longDescription: Template for defining brand guidelines including colors, typography, spacing, and component styles. Provides foundation for consistent UI implementation.
modules.whenToUse: When starting a new project or establishing design consistency across an application.

modules.name: Vercel Specialist
modules.longDescription: Expertise in Vercel platform including deployment configuration, edge functions, serverless functions, environment variables, and domain management.
whatItDoes: Sets up edge and serverless functions
modules.whenToUse: When deploying applications to Vercel or using Vercel-specific features.

modules.name: Shadcn Specialist
modules.longDescription: Expertise in Shadcn UI component library including installation, customization, theming, and best practices for building accessible React components.
modules.whenToUse: When building React applications with Shadcn UI component library.

modules.name: Mermaid Diagram Specialist
modules.longDescription: Expertise in creating Mermaid diagrams for documentation including flowcharts, sequence diagrams, entity-relationship diagrams, and architecture visualizations.
modules.whenToUse: When documenting architecture, workflows, or system designs in markdown files.
